uk.ac.liv.ai.learning
Class QLearner

java.lang.Object
  uk.ac.liv.ai.learning.AbstractLearner
      uk.ac.liv.ai.learning.QLearner
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, DiscreteLearner, Learner, MDPLearner, Parameterizable, Prototypeable, Resetable
public class QLearner
extends AbstractLearner
implements MDPLearner, Resetable, java.io.Serializable, Parameterizable, Prototypeable

An implementation of the Q-learning algorithm, with epsilon-greedy exploration.

Parameters

base.k
int >= 0		 (the number of a possible actions)
base.s
int >= 0		 (the number of states)
e.e
double [0,1]		 (the epsilon parameter)
base.p
double [0,1]		 (the learning rate)
base.g
double [0,1]		 (the discount rate)

Version:
$Revision$
Author:
Steve Phelps
See Also:
Serialized Form

public int act()
Description copied from interface: DiscreteLearner
Request that the learner perform an action. Users of the learning algorithm should invoke this method on the learner when they wish to find out which action the learner is currently recommending.

getLearningDelta

public double getLearningDelta()
Description copied from interface: Learner
Return a value indicative of the amount of learning that occured during the last iteration. Values close to 0.0 indicate that the learner has converged to an equilibrium state.

Specified by:
getLearningDelta in interface Learner
Specified by:
